title: "Deep-learning algorithm estimates cancer risk of pulmonary nodules"
excerpt: "A deep-learning algorithm can yield comparable performance to experienced thoracic radiologists in estimating the malignancy risk of pulmonary nodules on chest CT exams, according to research published online May 18 in Radiology."
